{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SorcBossAttack'''
(''no parameter'')
Sets the third (target speed) argument to 7 (SORCBALL_INITIAL_SPEED) and the forth (movement mode) to 1 (SORC_ACCELERATE). Would be the same as the following: SORC F 6 Bright [[A_SetSpecial]] (special, arg[0], arg[1], 7, 1, arg[4]) // OR SORC F 0 Bright [[A_SetArg]] (2, 7) SORC F 6 Bright [[A_SetArg]] (3, 1) This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Heresiarch}} and derived classes.
